qas.question: Who produces a list of requirements for a project, giving an overall view of the project's goals?
Who presents different ideas about how to accomplish goals?
Who selects and hires the best ideas and appropriate contractors?
What happens as they build phase 1?

plausible_answers.text: a list of requirements for a project

qas.question: What does the contractor produce to let everyone see the project's goals?
What does the owner produce to show how to attain the goals?

plausible_answers.text: selects the ideas he or she likes best

qas.question: Before they hire a contractor, what do the D&B contractors also do about a project?
Who is usually hired for a design-bid-build contract?

plausible_answers.text: the project is completely designed by the owner, then bid on, then completed

qas.question: What happens in a phase 2 contract?

context: <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2>The owner<a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> produces <b5_0>a list of requirements for a project<b5_0/>, giving an overall view of the project's goals. <a1_2>Several <a1_0><a1_1>D&B contractors<a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> present <b6_0>different ideas<b6_0/> about how to accomplish these goals. <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2>The owner<a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> <b7_0>selects the ideas he or she likes best<b7_0/> and hires the appropriate contractor. Often, it is not just one contractor, but <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><b8_0>a consortium of several contractors<b8_0/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> working together. Once these have been hired, they begin building the first phase of the project. As they build phase 1, <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>they design phase 2<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/>. This is in contrast to a design-bid-build contract, where <b9_0>the project is completely designed by the owner, then bid on, then completed<b9_0/>.
